history.content:
Interested in working on an enterprise-level application focused on extracting key insights from complex unstructured data sources?

Sipher is a startup that is working to build algorithmic customer experience drivers to improve customer satisfaction and retention. Join our team as an intern!

Frontend Development Intern:

  • Working on developing a live, interactive visualization dashboard that integrates various metrics and components to enhance user experience 
  • Working with various frontend APIs and connection
  • Designing and creating new features of interest such as a live update data feed, speed and scalability optimization,
  • Requirements: ReactJS, NodeJS, Javascript, HTML
  • Experience with charts and table APIs preferred 

Database & Backend Development Intern:

  • Developing solutions for scalability, application performance, and data growth
  • Designing data pipeline and database architecture - focused on efficient Big Data processing
  • Requirements: PostgresSQL, Python
  • Full stack and database architecture knowledge preferred

We’d love to have you join us! Feel free to reach out with any questions. Please send your resume and your position of interest to thesiphercompany@gmail.com
history.subject: Technical Frontend & Backend Opportunity!
